classes.name: Fighter
classes.description: Master of weapons and armor, fighters dominate the battlefield through superior martial training and versatility.

classes.name: Wizard
classes.description: Scholarly spellcasters who manipulate reality through arcane formulas and vast magical knowledge.

classes.name: Rogue
classes.description: Cunning specialists in stealth, traps, and precision strikes who exploit enemy weaknesses.

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: Divine champions who channel deity power to heal allies and smite foes with holy magic.

classes.name: Ranger
classes.description: Wilderness experts combining archery, tracking, and nature magic to hunt their chosen prey.

classes.name: Paladin
classes.description: Holy warriors bound by sacred oath, wielding righteous fury and divine protection.

classes.name: Barbarian
classes.description: Primal warriors who enter battle rage, unleashing devastating strength and resilience.

classes.name: Monk
classes.description: Martial artists channeling ki energy for supernatural speed, strikes, and self-perfection.

classes.name: Warlock
classes.description: Pact-bound casters drawing eldritch power from otherworldly patrons for dark magic.

classes.name: Bard
classes.description: Charismatic performers weaving magic through music, inspiring allies and deceiving enemies.

classes.name: Druid
classes.description: Nature guardians shapeshifting into beasts and commanding primal elemental forces.

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.description: Innate spellcasters with magic in their blood, manipulating spells through raw charisma.
